title: Aarya Floral Emerald Stud Earrings - A Timeless Elegance
materials: High-Quality Cubic Zirconia. Expertly crafted with Hyderabadi Polish for enduring luster.
features: Inspired by traditional South Indian floral motifs, these stud earrings feature an intricate filigree design. A central oval-cut emerald is embraced by a delicate arrangement of sparkling cubic zirconia, creating a harmonious blend of classic and contemporary aesthetics. The openwork design allows light to pass through, enhancing the brilliance of the gemstones. The floral 'Kundan' inspiration gives it a royal touch.
colors: Predominantly gold with vibrant green from the emerald and the sparkling white from cubic Zirconia.
occasions: or a special gift. Its versatile design complements both traditional attire like sarees and lehengas and modern ensembles.
description: These stud earrings represent a beautiful fusion of tradition and modernity. The combination of high-quality materials, intricate craftsmanship, and a timeless design makes them a valuable addition to any jewelry collection. The emerald's vibrant green symbolizes prosperity and renewal, making it a meaningful and stylish accessory. These earnings embody the artistic finesse of Hyderabadi jewelry.
